actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

official_title: To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide that any participant or beneficiary under an employee benefit plan shall be entitled to de novo review in court of benefit determinations under such plan.
short_title: Access to Disability Insurance Act of 1999

summary.text: Access to Disability Insurance Act of 1999 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to entitle any participant or beneficiary under an employee benefit plan to de novo review in court of benefit determinations under such plan.

titles.title: Access to Disability Insurance Act of 1999

To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide that any participant or beneficiary under an employee benefit plan shall be entitled to de novo review in court of benefit determinations under such plan.
